TRIAMCINOLONE ACETONIDE

CORTICOSTEROIDS (TOPICAL)CORTICOSTEROIDS (SYSTEMIC)CORTICOSTEROIDS (INTRANASAL)

  • Indications and doses
  • Patient and carer advice
  • Cautions
  • Unlicensed use
  • Exceptions to legal category
  • Medicinal forms

Indications and doses

Suppression of inflammatory and allergic disorders,

By deep intramuscular injection

  • For adults
    40 mg (max. per dose 100 mg), repeated if necessary, dose given for depot effect, to be administered into gluteal muscle; repeated at intervals according to patient's response.

Prophylaxis and treatment of allergic rhinitis,

By intranasal administration

  • For adults
    110 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, reduced to 55 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, reduce dose when control achieved.
  • For children 6–11 years
    55 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, increased if necessary to 110 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril; reduced to 55 micrograms once daily for maximum 3 months, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, reduce dose when control achieved.
  • For children 12–17 years
    110 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, reduced to 55 micrograms once daily, dose to be sprayed into each nostril, reduce dose when control achieved.

Advice for patients and carers

Patient counselling is advised for triamcinolone acetonide injection (steroid card).

Cautions regarding administration

  • With intramuscular use: high dosage (may cause proximal myopathy), avoid in chronic therapy in adults

Unlicensed use

With intra-articular use or intramuscular use or intranasal use in children

Not licensed for use in children under 6 years.

Exceptions to legal category

With intranasal use in adults

Preparations of triamcinolone acetonide can be sold to the public for nasal administration as a non-pressurised nasal spray if supplied for the symptomatic treatment of seasonal allergic rhinitis in adults over 18 years, subject to maximum daily dose of 110 micrograms per nostril for maximum 3 months, and a pack size of 3.575 mg.

Prepared medicinal forms of TRIAMCINOLONE ACETONIDE

There can be variation in the licensing of different medicines containing the same drug.

Forms available from special-order manufacturers include: paste,
Suspension for injection
Spray
